text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Dame un minuto para dejar mi equipaje en<n>mi habitación,<n>luego podemos comenzar a discutir—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Jeje... Tú tampoco lo estás haciendo<n>nada mal estos<n>días, Grass.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I have my sights set on a goal, so I must<n>keep
working hard until I reach it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Sí. Me encanta ese fuego en tus ojos.<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Maruzen... Se cierne tan grande como<n>siempre.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that, Grass kicks off the summer<n>camp
stronger than she was last year!
